bibl.title: Pausanias and Protocol: The Succession to Euergetes II.
bibl.note: Pausanias I, 9.1-3. It was probably Kleopatra III who reigned with Soter II down to 107 B.C.

bibl.title: Egitto e storia antica. Atti del Colloquio internazionale. Bologna, 31.8-2.9.1987

bibl.seg: Thompson Dorothy J., Pausanias and Protocol: The Succession to Euergetes II.
Egitto e storia antica. Atti del Colloquio internazionale. Bologna, 31.8-2.9.1987 (Bologna, 1989) pp. 693-701.
Pausanias I, 9.1-3. It was probably Kleopatra III who reigned with Soter II down to 107 B.C.
